Package tripleplay.ui

Added Classes and Interfaces
Icon An interface for icons.
Icons Contains icon related utility methods, mostly basic icon factories.
ImageIcon Use Icons.image.
PagedMenu A menu that is also capable of showing one page of its items at a time.
Style.Flag A Boolean style, with convenient members for on & off bindings.
 

Changed Classes and Interfaces
Button A button that displays text, or an icon, or both.
CheckBox Displays a checkbox which can be toggled.
Constraints Provides various user interface constraints.
Element The root of the interface element hierarchy.
Field Displays text which can be edited via the Keyboard.getText popup.
Interface The main class that integrates the Triple Play UI with a PlayN game.
Interface.Task A time based task that requires an update per frame.
Label A widget that displays one or more lines of text and/or an icon image.
LongPressButton A button that supports an action on a "long press".
MenuHost.Pop An event type for triggering a menu popup.
MenuItem An item in a menu.
Slider Displays a bar and a thumb that can be slid along the bar, representing a floating point value between some minimum and maximum.
Style Defines style properties for interface elements.
Tabs A composite {@code Elements} that implements tabbing.
ToggleButton A toggle button that displays text, or an icon, or both.
